tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Ceramic Veneers / Crowns ,Sensitive Teeth,Traumatic injuries Dental,Dental Cleaning,Braces Adjustment,
review: It all started in October 2019 with lots of sensitivity in my teeth and also a headache. But it was Dr Dimple and Dr Aman who were so commendable  in detecting the root issue and I am glad that I followed their advice and got my self braces even at the age of 30; I was hesitant  for a while in deciding though, but I am glad I did. It not only had an aesthetic but also cured all my sensitivity  and headache problem and can't appreciate much for their thorough professional work with a very friendly and assuring touch of theirs. Honestly speaking they are actually and only the one dentist specialist on whom I can blindly trust on. I really do not know that whether it is actually correct to say that or not actually but where all the other dentists just keep their original focus not on treatment, there they and their humbleness in treating me actually like their own little daughter is really commendable. A large thank you to themThey have solved all my teeth problems so seamlessly so now it is that I feel that people do not keep praising them just like that.An ideal dentist for me for the method with which they actually cured my tooth issues so early as well as so perfectly, without a single root canal, I feel others may not be able to do the same.Thankfulness is all I want to express to you my dentist.¬†Regards Laxmi
reply_text: Thank you Laxmi for your so kind words. Really appreciate.

context: Zirconia Crowns,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Fillings,
review:
Great experience with the Dr. Aman Arora
I visited Dr. for my root canal therapy zirconia crown and dental fillings . I was bit worried as dealing dental issue to be difficult but the behaviour and calm nature of Dr. during procedure and no pain after root canal. Expecting complete resolution of issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The clinic is very clean . The wait time was almost 0. Dr.Aman did 6 cavity filling.  He did amazing job also the pain was very less. Also he explained everything in detail before starting the whole process. I would highly recommend others for Arora dental clinic
reply_text: Thank you for the appreciation Ramneet üôè

review: The doctor was good , he resolved it ASAP  , and did not recommended lots of medication . He explained the issue in detailed manner and was a good listener. Doctor's generally don't listen much LOL üòÇ , but Dr Aman was good.
On time appointment, neat and clean surroundings, fully satisfactory. Doctor is very polite and supportive

context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: Dr Aman and Dr Dimple Arora both are very professional and competent doctor. I found them through Practo because I was looking for doctor who is specialist in dental crowning and bridging.  I am glad that we found them and we are very happy with results. They are friendly and easy to communicate and explaining the procedures thoroughly. Thank you f your service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Experienced toothache in the middle of lockdown. Doctor was kind enough to see me and help me with it on short notice. Both the doctors were caring and friendly and helped me understand the treatment and how to take preventive measures. I felt reassured in their treatment and my toothache went away in 2 days.
Helpfull and guided me well for my dental issues .you may visit and choose according to your need what kind of treatment you required my all over experience were good .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor was quit friendly and helpful.....they did my treatment and gave such a great suggestions for my teeth
Doctor was very calm an patient, listened my problem very carefully and gave proper time to explain my problem....

Satisfactory treatment. Bridging createad problem after 16 years. 
Good quality of hygiene. 
No more than one to two sitting in case of major problems 
Quality of teething material is very good.
